text:
Want to join one of the fastest growing Artificial Intelligence (AI) software companies in Toronto?

We are rapidly growing and are in need of great people to help us get to our next stage of development.

We are looking for DevOps professionals, a Systems Team Lead, Developers (Go and Clojure), as well as QA.

If you are inventive, creative, and driven we want to hear from you.

https://kirasystems.com/careers/
